subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The TimeScheduler service provides a services supporting the scheduling of activities to occur an certain intervals. The DefaultTimeScheduler block implements the service. When used in conjunction with the service is it a TimeTrigger. There are two such tiggers provided within the implementation CronTimeTrigger and PeriodicTimeTigger.
